column1: riellë or riel is a noun in Quenya and Telerin meaning "a maiden crowned with a festival garland" p.347
column2: or more simply "garlanded maiden". Compare with rî in Sindarin.

column1: Possible Primitive Elvish form *rîgellê from the Sundocarmë RIG.
* The Languages of Tolkiens Middle-earth by Ruth S. Noel
* http://www.uib.no/People/hnohf/qlist.htm Quenya Corpus Wordlist edited by Helge Fauskanger
